description: Dashboard to show the resource requests vs allocatable in the cluster and selected namespace

panels.description:
This represents the total [memory resource requests](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-compute-resources-container/#meaning-of-memory) in the cluster.
For comparison the total [allocatable memory](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/design-proposals/node-allocatable.md) is also shown.
panels.title: Memory

panels.description:
This represents the total [CPU resource requests](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-compute-resources-container/#meaning-of-cpu) in the cluster.
For comparison the total [allocatable CPU cores](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/design-proposals/node-allocatable.md) is also shown.
panels.title: CPU Cores

panels.description: NOTE: fixed at the last 60mins as this is an expensive query
panels.title: Wasted Memory by Namespace %

targets.expr:
sum(
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{exported_namespace=~".*", resource="memory"}) by (exported_namespace, pod)
 * on (exported_namespace, pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", exported_namespace=~".*"}) by (exported_namespace, pod) == 1)
 ) by (exported_namespace)

sum(
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{exported_namespace=~".*", resource="memory"}) by (exported_namespace, pod)
 * on (exported_namespace, pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", exported_namespace=~".*"}) by (exported_namespace, pod) == 1)
 ) by (exported_namespace)

(sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"}) by (exported_namespace, pod)* on (exported_namespace, pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (exported_namespace, pod) == 1)) by (exported_namespace))
-
(sum(label_replace(kubernetes_io:container_memory_used_bytes, "exported_namespace", "$1", "namespace_name", "(.+)")) by (exported_namespace))

((100 * 
(sum(label_replace(kubernetes_io:container_memory_used_bytes, "exported_namespace", "$1", "namespace_name", "(.+)")) by (exported_namespace))
/ 
sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"}) by (exported_namespace, pod)* on (exported_namespace, pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (exported_namespace, pod) == 1)) by (exported_namespace)
- 100) * -1)

sum(
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{exported_namespace=~".*", resource="cpu"}) by (exported_namespace, pod)
 * on (exported_namespace, pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", exported_namespace=~".*"}) by (exported_namespace, pod) == 1)
 ) by (exported_namespace)

sum(
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{exported_namespace=~".*", resource="cpu"}) by (exported_namespace, pod)
 * on (exported_namespace, pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (exported_namespace, pod) == 1)
 ) by (exported_namespace)

(sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"}) by (exported_namespace, pod)* on (exported_namespace, pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (exported_namespace, pod) == 1)) by (exported_namespace))
-
sum(label_replace(rate(kubernetes_io:container_cpu_core_usage_time{monitored_resource="k8s_container"}[1m]), "exported_namespace", "$1", "namespace_name", "(.+)")) by (exported_namespace)

((100 * 
(sum(label_replace(rate(kubernetes_io:container_cpu_core_usage_time{monitored_resource="k8s_container"}[1m]), "exported_namespace", "$1", "namespace_name", "(.+)")) by (exported_namespace))
/ 
sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"}) by (exported_namespace, pod)* on (exported_namespace, pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (exported_namespace, pod) == 1)) by (exported_namespace)
- 100) * -1)

((100 * 
(sum(label_replace(sum(avg_over_time(kube_metrics_server_pods_cpu[1d])) by (pod_namespace) / 1000000000, "namespace", "$1", "pod_namespace", "(.*)")) by (namespace))
/ 
sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"}) by (namespace, exported_pod)* on (namespace, exported_pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, exported_pod) == 1)) by (namespace)
- 100) * -1) > 0

panels.description: Shows requested memory vs used memory for the specified namespace

targets.expr:
sum(
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{exported_namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"}) by (pod)
 * on (pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", exported_namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod) == 1)
 ) / 1000

sum(
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{exported_namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"}) by (pod)
 * on (pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", exported_namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod) == 1)
 ) / 1000

panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Shows requested CPU vs used CPU for the specified namespace

targets.expr:
sum(
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{exported_namespace="$namespace", resource="cpu"}) by (pod)
 * on (pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", exported_namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod) == 1)
 )

sum(
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{exported_namespace="$namespace", resource="cpu"}) by (pod)
 * on (pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", exported_namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod) == 1)
 )

panels.title: CPU Cores

targets.expr:
((100 * 
(sum(label_replace(kubernetes_io:container_memory_used_bytes{namespace_name="$namespace"}, "pod", "$1", "pod_name", "(.+)")) by (pod))
/ 
sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", exported_namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod)* on (pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{exported_namespace="$namespace",phase="Running"}) by (pod) == 1)) by (pod)
- 100) * -1)

((100 * 
(sum(label_replace(rate(kubernetes_io:container_cpu_core_usage_time{monitored_resource="k8s_container",namespace_name="$namespace"}[1m]), "pod", "$1", "pod_name", "(.+)")) by (pod))
/ 
sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",exported_namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod)* on (pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",exported_namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod) == 1)) by( pod)
- 100) * -1)

panels.title: Memory usage by Pod over time
CPU usage by Pod over time

title: FinOps Stack: Used | Wasted Resources for cluster & namespace
